definition: to violate a prohibition or ban/prohibited/illicit
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against

sentences.english: A person used to transport drugs or contraband from one place to another.
sentences.chinese: 被用来从一地到另一地运送毒品或违禁品的人。

sentences.english: Is Alice quite sure what's contraband?
sentences.chinese: 爱丽斯很确定什么是违禁物品吗？

sentences.english: Sorry, you have some prohibited things with you.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，你带了一些违禁物品。

sentences.english: He had ingeniously strapped a number of packages to his legs containing contraband items.
sentences.chinese: 他很聪明，脚上缠着几盒含有违禁物品的东西。

sentences.english: Is there any contraband in your luggage?
sentences.chinese: 你行李里有什么违禁品吗？

sentences.english: Do you carry any fire-arms or narcotics?
sentences.chinese: 你有携带军火或违禁品吗？

sentences.english: We forgot that cameras are a no-no in hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 我们忘了相机在温泉里算是违禁品。

sentences.english: The anesthesiologist should not fail to question patients firmly regarding the use of illicit drugs.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况下，麻醉医生会漏问使用违禁药物的问题。

sentences.english: Also, PA equipment were added as well, alerting the passengers not taking contraband.
sentences.chinese: 安检等待区还增配了，反复通知旅客不许携带违禁品。

sentences.english: Also, steroid use and illegal drug use should be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 此外，甾体激素类使用和违禁药物使用也应当避免。

sentences.english: Legalization reduces or eliminates all of these burdens.
sentences.chinese: 而对违禁品的合法化能减轻甚至消除这些负担。

sentences.english: Their factory is producing medicines which are forbidden on a large scale .
sentences.chinese: 他们厂正在大规模地生产违禁药品。

sentences.english: Drugs and weapons aren't the only contraband in prisons these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今，监狱中的违禁品不再局限于毒品和武器。

sentences.english: It even proscribed the deliberate cultivation of lascivious thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至违禁故意栽培的想法。

sentences.english: If this becomes more widely known, will they make chocolate illegal?
sentences.chinese: 如果知道的人多了，巧克力会不会被归为违禁品？

sentences.english: I see. Have you got any contraband in your luggage?
sentences.chinese: 我知道了，在您的行李里有违禁物品吗？

definition: to sell illicitly/to bootleg/to sell privately
to totally prohibit/to put an end to
to smuggle/to have an illicit affair
unidentified origin/no-one knows where it comes from/of dubious background
